books.title: Designing Evolvable Web APIs with ASP.NET
books.subTitle: Harnessing the Power of the Web
books.author: Glenn Block et al.
books.description: Design and build Web APIs for a broad range of clients—including browsers and mobile devices—that can adapt to change over time. This practical, hands-on guide takes you through the theory and tools you need to build evolvable HTTP services with Microsoft
